    Spooncraft

    Welcome to the Spooncraft site! Here you can find useful information about the server, tutorials, world downloads and more.

    Pages

    • Tutorials
      • Creating a shop
      • Installing proximity chat

    The Spooncraft site contains useful information about the server, tutorials, world downloads and more. You can access all of the available pages from the sidebar.

    If you're new to the server, you may want to read the Info and Rules pages first.

    If you're not whitelisted yet, then make sure you've reached level 15 in the Discord, and type !whitelist <java/bedrock> <ign> in the #whitelisting channel.

    Server IPs

    Survival: mc.thatmumbojumbo.com
    Creative Plots: creative.thatmumbojumbo.com

    This site is a work in progress, feel free to give any feedback you may have in #spooncraft-feedback on discord.
